00021 #include <qbitmap.h>
00022 Function_Control_Area::Function_Control_Area(QWidget *parent, const char *name)
00023  : QWidget(parent, name)
00024 {
00025         xSetup();
00026 }

00033 void Function_Control_Area::xSetup()
00034 {
00035    QBitmap mask=QBitmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/function_control_masking.png");
00036    setMask(mask);
00037    //DAVID Setup Background;
00038    pixBackground.load("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/FunctionAreaBackground.png");
00039    setBackgroundPixmap(pixBackground);
00040    //InitButton Graphic
00041    btnGraphic[0]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-internet.png");
00042    btnGraphic[1]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-internet-active.png");
00043    btnGraphic[2]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-player.png");
00044    btnGraphic[3]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-player-active.png");
00045    btnGraphic[4]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-management.png");
00046    btnGraphic[5]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-management-active.png");
00047    btnGraphic[6]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-albumclock.png");
00048    btnGraphic[7]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-albumclock-active.png");
00049    btnGraphic[8]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-setting.png");
00050    btnGraphic[9]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-setting-active.png");
00051    btnGraphic[10]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-close.png");
00052    btnGraphic[11]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-close-active.png");
00053    btnGraphic[12]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-imagedetial.png");
00054    btnGraphic[13]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/skin-function-button-imagedetial-active.png");
00055    
00056    //Init Skinbutton
00057    fun_btn_internet             =new SkinButton(this);
00058    fun_btn_player              =new SkinButton(this);
00059    fun_btn_management     =new SkinButton(this);
00060    fun_btn_albumclock       =new SkinButton(this);
00061    fun_btn_setting             =new SkinButton(this);
00062    fun_btn_close               =new SkinButton(this);
00063    fun_btn_imagedetial      =new SkinButton(this);
00064    
00065    fun_btn_internet->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[0],btnGraphic[1]);
00066    fun_btn_internet->setGeometry(0,0,135,135);
00067    fun_btn_internet->show();
00068    
00069    fun_btn_player->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[2],btnGraphic[3]);
00070    fun_btn_player->setGeometry(0,0,135,135);
00071    fun_btn_player->hide();
00072    
00073    fun_btn_management->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[4],btnGraphic[5]);
00074    fun_btn_management->setGeometry(0,0,135,135);
00075    fun_btn_management->hide();
00076    
00077    fun_btn_albumclock->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[6],btnGraphic[7]);
00078    fun_btn_albumclock->setGeometry(0,0,135,135);
00079    fun_btn_albumclock->hide();
00080    
00081    fun_btn_setting->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[8],btnGraphic[9]);
00082    fun_btn_setting->setGeometry(0,0,135,135);
00083    fun_btn_setting->hide();
00084    
00085    fun_btn_close->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[10],btnGraphic[11]);
00086    fun_btn_close->setGeometry(0,0,135,135);
00087    fun_btn_close->hide();
00088    
00089    fun_btn_imagedetial->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[12],btnGraphic[13]);
00090    fun_btn_imagedetial->setGeometry(0,0,135,135);
00091    fun_btn_imagedetial->hide();
00092    
00093    
00094    
00095    connect(fun_btn_internet,SIGNAL(released()),this,SLOT(slotProcessChangeFunc()));
00096     connect(fun_btn_player,SIGNAL(released()),this,SLOT(slotProcessChangeFunc()));
00097      connect(fun_btn_management,SIGNAL(released()),this,SLOT(slotProcessChangeFunc()));
00098       connect(fun_btn_albumclock,SIGNAL(released()),this,SLOT(slotProcessChangeFunc()));
00099        connect(fun_btn_setting,SIGNAL(released()),this,SLOT(slotProcessChangeFunc()));
00100         connect(fun_btn_close,SIGNAL(released()),this,SLOT(slotProcessChangeFunc()));
00101         connect(fun_btn_imagedetial,SIGNAL(released()),this,SLOT(slotImageDetial()));
00102       //DAVID Set the Function Control Area State
00103       
00104       slotChangeButton(GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE);
00105       emit signalChangeFunc(GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE);
00106 }
00107 
00108 void Function_Control_Area::slotProcessChangeFunc()
00109 {
00110   //DAVID Process To Next Function
00111   GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE++;
00112   GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE%=6;
00113   //qWarning("FunctionState::%d\n",GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE);
00114   slotChangeButton(GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE);
00115   emit signalChangeFunc(GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE);
00116 }
00117 
00118 void Function_Control_Area::slotChangeButton(int v)
00119 {
00120    if(v==em_internet)
00121    {
00122      fun_btn_internet->show();
00123      fun_btn_player->hide();
00124      fun_btn_management->hide();
00125      fun_btn_albumclock->hide();
00126      fun_btn_setting->hide();
00127      fun_btn_close->hide();
00128      fun_btn_imagedetial->hide();
00129    }
00130    else if(v==em_player)
00131    {
00132      fun_btn_internet->hide();
00133      fun_btn_player->show();
00134      fun_btn_management->hide();
00135      fun_btn_albumclock->hide();
00136      fun_btn_setting->hide();
00137      fun_btn_close->hide();
00138      fun_btn_imagedetial->hide();
00139    }
00140    else if(v==em_management)
00141    {
00142      fun_btn_internet->hide();
00143      fun_btn_player->hide();
00144      fun_btn_management->show();
00145      fun_btn_albumclock->hide();
00146      fun_btn_setting->hide();
00147      fun_btn_close->hide();
00148      fun_btn_imagedetial->hide();
00149    }
00150    else if(v==em_albumclock)
00151    {
00152      fun_btn_internet->hide();
00153      fun_btn_player->hide();
00154      fun_btn_management->hide();
00155      fun_btn_albumclock->show();
00156      fun_btn_setting->hide();
00157      fun_btn_close->hide();
00158      fun_btn_imagedetial->hide();
00159    }
00160    else if(v==em_setting)
00161    {
00162      fun_btn_internet->hide();
00163      fun_btn_player->hide();
00164      fun_btn_management->hide();
00165      fun_btn_albumclock->hide();
00166      fun_btn_setting->show();
00167      fun_btn_close->hide();
00168      fun_btn_imagedetial->hide();
00169    }
00170    else if(v==em_close)
00171    {
00172      fun_btn_internet->hide();
00173      fun_btn_player->hide();
00174      fun_btn_management->hide();
00175      fun_btn_albumclock->hide();
00176      fun_btn_setting->hide();
00177      fun_btn_close->show();
00178      fun_btn_imagedetial->hide();
00179    }
00180    else if(v==em_imagedetial)
00181    {
00182     fun_btn_internet->hide();
00183      fun_btn_player->hide();
00184      fun_btn_management->hide();
00185      fun_btn_albumclock->hide();
00186      fun_btn_setting->hide();
00187      fun_btn_close->hide();
00188      fun_btn_imagedetial->show();
00189    }
00190 }
00191 
00192 void Function_Control_Area::slotImageDetial()
00193 {
00194       //Back to em_management state
00195       GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE=em_management;
00196       slotChangeButton(GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE);
00197       emit signalChangeFunc(GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE);
00198       emit signalBackToManagement();
00199 }
00200 
00201 void Function_Control_Area::slotShowImageDetial()
00202 {
00203       GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE=em_imagedetial;
00204       slotChangeButton(GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE);
00205       emit signalChangeFunc(GlobalSetting.intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE);
00206 }
